entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
